author: Tristan Greene
title: Opinion: If you love Trump you're duty-bound to help crowdfund the wall
description: Despite the fact I haven't announced it on Twitter yet (thus making it an official government document), I'd like to inform everyone that I wholeheartedly support the GoFundMe effort ...
content: Despite the fact I havent announced it on Twitter yet (thus making it an official government document), Id like to inform everyone that I wholeheartedly support the GoFundMe effort purported to be setup to fund President Trumps border wall. In fact, Id like tâ€¦ [+7170 chars]
